mapper.select: SELECT ANSWER_ID, USER_ID, QUESTION_ID, ANSWER_TITLE, ANSWER_CONTENT, ANSWER_REGISTER_DATETIME, ANSWER_IS_PUBLIC, ANSWER_LIKE_COUNT, ANSWER_IS_ADOPTED, DOCTOR_NAME, NVL(( SELECT COUNT(ANSWER_BOOKMARK_ID) FROM TBL_ANSWER_BOOKMARK GROUP BY ANSWER_ID ), 0) BOOKMARK_COUNT, NVL(( SELECT (COUNT(ANSWER_ID) / (SELECT COUNT(ANSWER_ID) FROM TBL_ANSWER WHERE USER_ID = D.USER_ID GROUP BY USER_ID)) FROM TBL_ANSWER WHERE USER_ID = D.USER_ID AND ANSWER_IS_ADOPTED = 1 GROUP BY USER_ID ), 0) ADOPTED_ANSWER_PERCENT, HOSPITAL_NAME, DOCTOR_DEPARTMENT_TYPE FROM TBL_ANSWER D WHERE QUESTION_ID = #{questionId}
